for <WG3778> this, <WG3778> my <WG3450> son, <WG5207> was <WG2258> dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> is alive again. <WG2532> He was <WG2258> lost, <WG622> and <WG2532> is found. <WG2147>' They <WG2532> began <WG756> to celebrate. <WG2165>
